text: China Factory () is a Chinese cuisine restaurant chain based in South Korea and owned by the CJ Group. As of 2014, the chain had over 17 retail stores in South Korea. The business closed its doors on May 21, 2017, however, China Factory Delight, a subsidiary, is still in business. ==References== ==External links== * Category:South Korean brands Category:Restaurant chains in South Korea Category:Chinese restaurants Category:CJ Group subsidiaries
title: China Factory (restaurant)
